meanings.definition: A narrow horizontal surface projecting from a wall or cliff.
meanings.sent1: The bird perched on the ledges of the building.
meanings.sent2: The climbers carefully navigated the ledges of the cliff.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel played hide-and-seek among the ledges.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was a solid ledge in the storm of uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The sun cast long shadows on the narrow ledges of the canyon walls.

meanings.definition: A projecting ridge on a mountain or underwater.
meanings.sent1: The hikers admired the breathtaking view from the mountain ledges.
meanings.sent2: Divers explored the colorful coral reefs and underwater ledges.
meanings.sent3: The fish swam playfully around the underwater ledges.
meanings.sent4: The mountain stood tall, its ledges reaching towards the sky.
meanings.sent5: The jagged ledges of the cliff resembled a dragon's spine against the sky.

meanings.definition: A layer or stratum of rock.
meanings.sent1: The geologists studied the different ledges of rock in the quarry.
meanings.sent2: The ancient fossils were found in the lower ledges of the sedimentary rock.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous raccoon peeked out from behind the ledge of rock.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to stand still in the solid ledges of the canyon walls.
meanings.sent5: The ledges of rock told the story of millions of years of Earth's history.
